summary: AN ORDINANCE repealing Sections 299, 299-A, 300, 300-A, 300-B, 300-C, 300-D, 300-E, 300-G, 300-H, 300-J, 300-K, 327, 328, 328-A, 328-B, 328-C, and 328-D of the License Code (Ordinance 48022), and Ordinances 70384, 85795, and 87384, relating to the Licensing and regulation of the sale, use and operation of certain amusement devices and mechanical music machines.
